text: Abba is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Bérangère Abba (born 1976), French politician *Cele Abba (1906–1992), Italian stage and film actress * Dimi Mint Abba (born 1958), Mauritanian musician * Giuseppe Cesare Abba (1838–1910), Italian patriot and writer * Marta Abba (1900–1988), Italian stage actress == See also == * Raba Bar Jeremiah, also called "Abba", Jewish Talmudist == References == Category:Italian-language surnames
title: Abba (surname)
